sentences.en: "Did I wake you?" — "Yes, but it doesn't matter."
sentences.cn: “我把你吵醒了？”——“是的，不过没关系。”

sentences.en: Adam stumbles on, leaving a trail of devastation in his wake.
sentences.cn: 亚当蹒跚而行，沿路留下毁坏的痕迹。

sentences.en: Dolphins sometimes play in the wake of the boats.
sentences.cn: 有时海豚在船的尾流中嬉戏。

sentences.en: I asked for a wake-up call at 6.30 a.m.
sentences.cn: 我请他们在早晨6:30打电话叫醒我。

sentences.en: I crept up the stairs, trying not to wake my parents.
sentences.cn: 为了尽量不吵醒父母，我蹑手蹑脚地上了楼。

sentences.en: I nearly always wake up fresh and rested.
sentences.cn: 我几乎每天醒来都精神抖擞，得到了充分休息。

sentences.en: In his wake came a waiter wheeling a trolley.
sentences.cn: 一位推着手推车的侍者紧随着他过来。

sentences.en: Jake wanted to wake up, but sleep held him back.
sentences.cn: 杰克想要醒来，但睡意使他又沉入梦乡。

sentences.en: She prodded him in the ribs to wake him up.
sentences.cn: 她用手指杵他的肋部把他叫醒。

sentences.en: She went upstairs to wake Milton.
Splash water over his face, it'll help to wake him.
sentences.cn: 用水浇他的脸, 这样会使他清醒过来.

sentences.en: The ride was smooth until they got into the merchant ship's wake.
sentences.cn: 航行一直很顺利，直到他们碰上了商船的尾流。

sentences.en: Try not to wake the baby.
What time do you usually wake up in the morning?
When she woke, the sun was streaming through the windows.
sentences.cn: 她醒来时，阳光泻入窗内。

sentences.en: Would she wake to find Gaston sleeping peacefully at her side?
sentences.cn: 她醒来会发现加斯顿安详地睡在她身旁吗？

sentences.en: You have to wake up now, baby.

words.tran_cn: 醒来，唤醒；唤起（记忆）（wake的现在分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: [物]尾流（由空气动力压力差产生的一对绕着翼尖的闭合涡旋）
维克森林（指美国北卡罗来纳州一城镇或大学）
维克森林大学（美国一所私立大学）
醒来，起床；开始警觉；开始了解真相

phrases.phrase: wake up and smell the coffee
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式，主北美)清醒一点，面对现实

trans.tran_cn: （葬礼前后的）守夜，守灵，(航行中的船等留下的)尾流，航迹
trans.tran_en: the time before or after a funeral when friends and relatives meet to remember the dead person
to stop sleeping, or to make someone stop sleeping
